类 api.Hand
的使用

  • 使用Hand的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    api  

    • api中Hand的使用

      返回Hand的api中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Hand IEvaluator.createHand(Card[] allCards, int[] subset)
      Returns a hand whose main cards consist of the indicated subset of the given cards.
      Hand IEvaluator.getBestHand(Card[] allCards)
      Returns the best possible hand satisfying this evaluator's criteria that can be formed from the given list of cards.
